The best type of exercise for a person with arthritis is low-impact aerobic exercises, such as walking, swimming, and cycling. These exercises are gentle on the joints and can help to improve strength, flexibility, and range of motion. Additionally, stretching and strengthening exercises can help to reduce pain and stiffness associated with arthritis. It is important to consult with a doctor before beginning any exercise program to ensure that it is safe and appropriate for the individual.

Arithmetic mean is the average of a set of numbers. It is calculated by adding all the numbers in the set and then dividing the sum by the number of elements in the set. For example, the arithmetic mean of 5, 10, 15, and 20 is 12.5. This is calculated by adding 5 + 10 + 15 + 20 and then dividing the sum by 4 (the number of elements in the set). The result is 12.5. A method for detecting spam emails is to use a spam filter. A spam filter is a program that scans incoming emails for suspicious content and flags them as spam. It can also be used to block emails from known spammers. Additionally, it is important to be aware of the sender's email address, as many spammers use fake email addresses to disguise their identity.     return num1 + num2
